cards.title: Breach Mage
setup: Two "Closed Potent Breach" are put into play with 3 and 4 tokens in their Focus Pools.
Two "Open Stable Breach" are put into play.
gameplay: At the start of your turn, you may activate thr Cast effects of each of your Spells and destroy those spells.
powers: Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, select a card and activate its [u]Cast[/u] text twice, then destroy that card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

flippedBody: When this card has no tokens in its Focus Pool, flip it.
cards.flippedPowers: Remove 1 token from this card's Focus Pool.
